milkha singh had a phobia of pakistan. his family originally hailed from pak but during separation of countries in 1947 communal war broke out. he ran ("bhaaga") for his life, as he turned back to look, he saw his family being butchered by swordsmen on horsebacks. he was just a child, age less than 10. he grew up to be an excellent runner & represented india in international competitions. but his phobia never left. he could still feel shadows of those swordsmen on horsebacks coming for him.....
